channel.title: Nadal on Erlich Bachman
channel.description: Recent content in Nadal on Erlich Bachman

item.title: Rafa : Reading Experience
item.description: Here it is. 4th book of the year Rafa by Rafael Nadal and John Carlin. Being arguably the biggest Rafa fan on this planet this book was in my reading bucket list from a long time. Finally got the opportunity to read this. This is great in both sense, it gives you a more closer look into the life of your idol and at the same time shows you what does it take to be a champion?
